Uses of Interface
playn.core.Canvas

  • Packages that use Canvas 
    Package Description
    playn.core  
    playn.core.canvas  
    playn.core.gl

    • Uses of Canvas in playn.core

      Classes in playn.core that implement Canvas 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractCanvas
      A base Canvas implementation shared by all platforms.
      Methods in playn.core that return Canvas 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Canvas CanvasImage.canvas()
      Returns this image's canvas.
      Canvas Canvas.clear()
      Clears the entire canvas to rgba(0, 0, 0, 0).
      Canvas Canvas.clearRect(float x, float y, float width, float height)
      Clears the specified region to rgba(0, 0, 0, 0).
      Canvas Canvas.clip(Path clipPath)
      Intersects the current clip with the specified path.
      Canvas Canvas.clipRect(float x, float y, float width, float height)
      Intersects the current clip with the supplied rectangle.
      Canvas Canvas.drawImage(Image image, float dx, float dy)
      Draws an image at the specified location.
      Canvas Canvas.drawImage(Image image, float dx, float dy, float dw, float dh)
      Draws a scaled image at the specified location.
      Canvas Canvas.drawImage(Image image, float dx, float dy, float dw, float dh, float sx, float sy, float sw, float sh)
      Draws a scaled subset of an image at the specified location.
      Canvas Canvas.drawImageCentered(Image image, float dx, float dy)
      Draws an image, centered at the specified location.
      Canvas Canvas.drawLine(float x0, float y0, float x1, float y1)
      Draws a line between the two specified points.
      Canvas Canvas.drawPoint(float x, float y)
      Draws a single point at the specified location.
      Canvas Canvas.drawText(String text, float x, float y)
      Draws text at the specified location.
      Canvas Canvas.fillCircle(float x, float y, float radius)
      Fills a circle at the specified center and radius.
      Canvas Canvas.fillPath(Path path)
      Fills the specified path.
      Canvas Canvas.fillRect(float x, float y, float width, float height)
      Fills the specified rectangle.
      Canvas Canvas.fillRoundRect(float x, float y, float width, float height, float radius)
      Fills the specified rounded rectangle.
      Canvas Canvas.fillText(TextLayout text, float x, float y)
      Fills the text at the specified location.
      Canvas Canvas.restore()
      Restores the canvas's previous state.
      Canvas Canvas.rotate(float radians)
      Rotates the current transformation matrix by the specified angle in radians.
      Canvas Canvas.save()
      The save and restore methods preserve and restore the state of the canvas, but not specific paths or graphics.
      Canvas Canvas.scale(float x, float y)
      Scales the current transformation matrix by the specified amount.
      Canvas Canvas.setAlpha(float alpha)
      Set the global alpha value to be used for all painting.
      Canvas Canvas.setCompositeOperation(Canvas.Composite composite)
      Sets the Porter-Duff composite operation to be used for all painting.
      Canvas Canvas.setFillColor(int color)
      Sets the color to be used for fill operations.
      Canvas Canvas.setFillGradient(Gradient gradient)
      Sets the gradient to be used for fill operations.
      Canvas Canvas.setFillPattern(Pattern pattern)
      Sets the pattern to be used for fill operations.
      Canvas Canvas.setLineCap(Canvas.LineCap cap)
      Sets the line-cap mode for strokes.
      Canvas Canvas.setLineJoin(Canvas.LineJoin join)
      Sets the line-join mode for strokes.
      Canvas Canvas.setMiterLimit(float miter)
      Sets the miter limit for strokes.
      Canvas Canvas.setStrokeColor(int color)
      Sets the color for strokes.
      Canvas Canvas.setStrokeWidth(float strokeWidth)
      Sets the width for strokes, in pixels.
      Canvas Canvas.strokeCircle(float x, float y, float radius)
      Strokes a circle at the specified center and radius.
      Canvas Canvas.strokePath(Path path)
      Strokes the specified path.
      Canvas Canvas.strokeRect(float x, float y, float width, float height)
      Strokes the specified rectangle.
      Canvas Canvas.strokeRoundRect(float x, float y, float width, float height, float radius)
      Strokes the specified rounded rectangle.
      Canvas Canvas.strokeText(TextLayout text, float x, float y)
      Strokes the text at the specified location.
      Canvas Canvas.transform(float m11, float m12, float m21, float m22, float dx, float dy)
      Multiplies the current transformation matrix by the given matrix.
      Canvas Canvas.translate(float x, float y)
      Translates the current transformation matrix by the given amount.
